title: Wacky Duck
additional-note: A note in the 1975 CCE Periodicals volume for 'Wackie Duck' says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information, as did a note in the January-June 1976 CCE Periodicals volume for 'Wacky Duck'.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the Fall 1946 issue, and was filed in 1974. The actual issue covers appear to use the spelling 'Wacky Duck' consistently.
